csl:
<style 
      xmlns="http://purl.org/net/xbiblio/csl"
      class="note"
      version="1.0"><info>
    <id />
    <title />
    <updated>2009-08-10T04:49:00+09:00</updated></info><citation>
    <layout>
      <text value="Hello"/>
      <choose>
        <if variable="issued">
          <date prefix="(" suffix=")" variable="issued">
            <date-part form="long" name="month" />
            <date-part name="day" suffix=", " />
            <date-part name="year" />
          </date>
        </if>
      </choose>
    </layout></citation></style>
